haikus.text:
In moonlit gardens wildflowers grow
Birds sing sweet melodies above
Silent rustling wind whispers tales

In moonlight twilight's glow
The winding pathway leads to you
Orange sunset clouds drift by
lines: The winding pathway leads to you

haikus.text:
Silently still
The moon sits above us all
A gentle whisper on windswept grasses
lines: The moon sits above us all
A gentle whisper on windswept grasses

prompt_info.system_prompt: You are a master haiku poet. Write haikus in the traditional 5-7-5 syllable format. Each haiku has exactly 3 lines: first line 5 syllables, second line 7 syllables, third line 5 syllables. Write with vivid imagery and emotional depth. Output ONLY the haiku, nothing else.
prompt_info.user_prompt:
Write a serene haiku about "moonlit garden". Include imagery of autumn (falling leaves).

Example haiku:
An old silent pond
A frog jumps into the pond
Splash! Silence again

Now write one original haiku about "moonlit garden" (5-7-5 syllables, 3 lines only):
